text: Does anyone have any tips on how to properly evaluate a DAE solver? `IDA` works well, but I can't really use it to compute high-accuracy reference solutions since it does not support BigFloats. And `DABDF2` was not able to solve the problem (Robertson) for 1e-12 tolerances.

elements.text: Does anyone have any tips on how to properly evaluate a DAE solver? `IDA` works well, but I can't really use it to compute high-accuracy reference solutions since it does not support BigFloats. And `DABDF2` was not able to solve the problem (Robertson) for 1e-12 tolerances.

text: Use RadauIIA5 in mass matrix form

elements.text: Use RadauIIA5 in mass matrix form
